mapper.update: update t_comment set rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commentUserId = #{commentuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beCommentUserId = #{becommentuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, rid, commentUserId, beCommentUserId, content, createtime from t_comment

select c.id, c.rid, c.commentUserId, c.beCommentUserId, c.content, c.createtime, (select nickname from t_user where id=c.commentUserId) as commentUserName, (select headimg from t_user where id=c.commentUserId) as commentUserHeadimg, (select nickname from t_user where id=c.beCommentUserId) as beCommentUserName, (select headimg from t_user where id=c.beCommentUserId) as beCommentUserHeadimg from t_comment c where c.rid=#{rid} order by c.id desc
